reviews.text: Spent 3 nights here, overall pleasant experience. Staff were friendly & helpful. Beds comfortable. It would be nice to have wi-fi in rooms but it is free in the lobby. The location is great, an easy walk to the main shopping area & tram station directly across the street. I would recommend it.
reviews.title: Nice location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of the hotel was a real plus, especially as we were coming and going from the train station. It is also close to just about everything we wanted to see and we were able to walk. We had a nice size room which was very clean and quiet. The dining area looked beautiful however we did not have the breakfast so I can't comment.
reviews.title: nice hotel near the train station with helpful staff

reviews.text: The staff were very good, very helpful. They held our luggage for us at the desk while we traveled to Bamburg for the day. They also gave us a free cable for our computer which worked much better than the other hotels we stayed in using wifi. Also, after moving on to other parts of Germany I realized I had left a scarf in our room. I emailed the hotel to ask if it would be possible to send it to me in Canada. They were very prompt in their responses and would have taken the trouble to mail it to me but in the end I told them not to bother. I really appreciated that they were very friendly in their correspondence.
reviews.title: Functional hotel

reviews.text: Functional business, impersonal hotel
reviews.title: Nice Business Hotel

reviews.text: Positive: very good location, very clean and functional rooms, good breakfast buffet, nice bar/restaurant/lounge
reviews.title: Great location!
Convenient Location
reviews.text: Our family was on a Viking River Cruise; but due to unusual rain and flooding on the Danube, part of our cruise was altered due to a broken lock on the river. We were put up at the NH for two days/nights. The hotel was very modern, clean and comfortable. The hotel's location is conveniently located for walking into the city centre which we did several times. The meals we had at the hotel restaurant were very good also!

reviews.text: We booked this hotel as a "Top Secret" deal and got a great price for a city centre hotel, the location is great, near the main railway station but it has to be said that like any main railway station the area just outside the station was less than desirable,
reviews.title: Convenient location.

reviews.title: Good, but nothing special

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Got a pre-paid early bird price (25% off). Very cost effective for a convenient location just near the central railway station. We took this hotel as a base to explore Bavaria by train. A typical 4 star hotel. Well equipped, quiet and comfortable enough. Easy walk to the medieval old city of Nuremberg with great walking streets, restaurants and historical sites. The downside is the room is a little dusty and the bathroom needs some refreshment. Overall a very good choice in central Nuremberg.
reviews.title: Very Good Choice in Central Nuremberg

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband regularly stays at this hotel for business and I decided to join him for the weekend. The hotel is a hop, skip and a jump away from the main station and walking distance from the old town. Its location is also very quiet. The rooms are spacious, the bed huge and comfortable and the shower (over bath) has good water pressure (an absolute must for us). The front-of-house staff is very friendly and the hotel offers really good value.
reviews.title: A solid four star

reviews.text: The hotel lost one star for the expensive breakfast (we opted out); and the internet, which is supposedly free, but is capped and only available via ethernet in the rooms. If you have multiple devices, your only solution is to sit in the lobby where there is wifi, but be warned - it is dead slow and there is not a lot of seating space available.
reviews.title: Clean, comfortable, Quality room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all, a very pleasant stay and we will definitely be back.
reviews.title: Friendly and attentive staff, clean, good facilities.

reviews.text: The hotel was of a high standard with a nicely designed room and bathroom. The wooden floors gave the room a modern feel, and there was plenty of storage and hanging space.
reviews.title: Comfortable

reviews.text: The room is very clean and comfortable, air conditioned in summer. The location is good, but in front of the hotel is a contruction area with much dust. Only 7 mins walking to the Nürnberg old town, main station and shopping area. The receptionist was not so friendly but it was ok. We can park our car in their underground garage, cost €14 per day. It's a little bit expensive but I think hotels which is located near the city center have more expensive parking cost. But overall we were satisfied with this hotel, will be one of our options when we visit Nürnberg again.
reviews.title: Clean comfortable room, good location
